cause.description:
the environment is suffering from everyone's wastes and bad habits. please help keep the world clean by putting your trash away. think of the beautiful habitats being destroyed by humans inability to be responsible. people are littering the world, not animals. but yet they are also having to suffer the consequences. we're not the only creatures on this planet, but yet most people think that we are. be more considerate.
1. Littering is a major cause of pollution.
2. There are more species in this world than just us humans, yet we're the only ones dirtying up the planet.
3. Everyone suffers from littering, not just animals and the enirvonment, but people too.
cause.name: STOP LITTERING!
